title: 'Birdman' Follows A Film Actor Frantic To Prove Himself Onstage
teaser: The choreography by Alejandro Iñárritu, who directed 21 Grams and Babel, will wow you. But the story about a washed-up actor about to bring off his Broadway debut is an "empty masterwork."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
